background_color.description: Select a background color to be shown if no image or video is provided. Also works as a background color for transparent images.

background_brightness.description: Darken or brighten the background image using the Storyblok Image Service.

background_blur.description: Blur the background image using the Storyblok Image Service.

text_color.description: Only applies if styles default or ghost are selected.

border_radius.description: Only applies if rounded corners are enabled in the global site configuration.

enable_composed_image.description: This option allows the rendering of four images in a pre-defined layout. If it is disabled, only the first image is used.

rotate.description: Rotate the image(s) by x degrees using the range slider.

cols.description: The maximum amount of columns that should be shown in wide viewports.
The maximum amount of columns that should be shown in wide viewports.

all_presets.name: Embark on Epic Adventures Beyond Earth
What do astronauts do for fun?

preview.description: This setting only applies to the preview in the Visual Editor. Which content will be served is determined in the frontend.

use_custom_fonts.description: If you want to override the default font (Roboto), you can enable this option and pick from a selection of fonts below,

custom_font_display.default_value: Custom font to be used for headlines.

custom_font_body.default_value: Custom font to be used for everything except headlines.

header_auto_nav.description: If this option is enabled, up to five stories from your content root folder are automatically displayed (in the same order).

header_auto_nav_folder.description: Provide the name of any top-level folder. If no folder is defined, the root folder is used.

overlap_preceding_hero.description: Only works if the single color background option is not enabled.

all_presets.name: We don't know what we don't know
We don't know what we don't know.
